modName: Integrated Hairstyles For Humans and Orcs (WIP)
summary: Removes hairstyle discrimination for human races and orcs. Males only
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]Integrated Hairstyles For Humans and Orcs [/size][/font][/center]So this mod will remove hairstyle discrimination for humans and orcs. 
In the vanilla game, Nords, Imperials and Bretons were unable to have hair like Redguards or Orcs.
(The same went for Orcs with human hair, and Redguards with Nord, Imperial or Breton hair.)
So now, I've made a mod that basically makes those hairstyles accessible regardless of race. Unless you're an Elf, or a Beast race. 
So now if you're an Imperial, you can rock some sweet dreadlocks, or have an Oriental-style top knot ponytail. 
It's a WIP now.
The mod is currently males only but if you guys like what you see, I'll make a female version.
author: Ronin
